channel.title: C# on kodebot
channel.description: Recent content in C# on kodebot

item.title: Decorator over Inheritance hierarchy
item.description: I have used inheritance to solve a problem in many situations - some of them are correct and some of them are not when thinking about it now. When you are in a situation where you think you need multi-level inheritance, 9 out of 10 times you can solve the same problem using decorators. One of the problems I have seen recently which fits in this pattern is the implementation of ICommand interface.
